Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Thommasson
Reviews.Content: Very good Thailand made photo-camera. The package has come quickly and it contained all items as described. I've tested it a lot, specially in HD movie mode. I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: great item, very happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Peter A. Stasiek
Reviews.Content: Very happy with purchase. The camera is great along with the additional items that came with the bundle, lenses, grip etc.

ProductInfo.Features:

<12> HB-45 Lens Hood + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Black) with 55-300mm VR Lens + 32GB Card + Backpack + Grip + Battery & Charger + Filters Kit
